content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crushed Toe

Normal damage. The target is clumsy 2 and takes a -10-foot status penalty to land Speed. Both effects last until healed.

Bludgeoning

Stinger

Normal damage. The target is sickened 3.

Piercing

Missing Digits

Normal damage. The target loses 1d4 fingers on one hand and becomes clumsy 1 until subject to regeneration spell or similar effect.

Slashing

Strange Goo

Normal damage and the target is restrained, using your class DC as the DC to Escape.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #12
